term.title: glycoconjugate

item.text: A type of compound consisting of carbohydrate units covalently linked with other types of chemical constituent.

sources.item: PAC, 1988, 60, 1389. 'Nomenclature of glycoproteins, glycopeptides and peptidoglycans (Recommendations 1985)' on page 1390 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198860091389)

term.citation: Citation: 'glycoconjugate' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.G02651

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
